org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects

Class SourcePathManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.projects.SourcePathManager

  • public final class SourcePathManager
extends Object
    Maintains a source path for a ASProject.

    • Method Detail

      • isFileOnSourcePath

        public boolean isFileOnSourcePath(File file)
        Test if a file is on the source path or not.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to test. May not be null.
        Returns:
        true if the file is on the source path, false otherwise.

      • computeQName

        public static String computeQName(File ancestor,
                  File descendent)

      • addFile

        public boolean addFile(File f)
        Notifies this SourcePathManager that a file as been added to the file system.

        This SourcePathManager will determine if any source path entries contain the specified file and if so, will create new ICompilationUnit's and add them to the project.

        Parameters:
        f - File that has been added to the file system.
        Returns:
        true if any ICompilationUnit's were created and added to the project.

      • removeFile

        public boolean removeFile(File f)
        Notifies this SourcePathManager that a file as been deleted from the file system.

        This SourcePathManager will determine if any source path entries contain the specified file and if so, will remove ICompilationUnit's from the project.

        Parameters:
        f - File that has been removed from the file system.
        Returns:
        true if any ICompilationUnit's were removed from the project.

      • collectionCompilationUnitsForRootSourceFile

        public void collectionCompilationUnitsForRootSourceFile(File rootSourceFile,
                                               Collection<ICompilationUnit> units)
        Adds all the ICompilationUnit's whose root source file is the specified File to the specified collection.
        Parameters:
        rootSourceFile - File to search for.
        units - Collection to add to.

      • hasCompilationUnitsForRootSourceFile

        public boolean hasCompilationUnitsForRootSourceFile(File rootSourceFile)
        Determines of the specified file is the root source file of any ICompilationUnit created by this SourcePathManager.
        Parameters:
        rootSourceFile - File to search for.
        Returns:
        true if the specified file is the root source file of any ICompilationUnit's created by this SourcePathManager.

      • getSourceFileInPath

        public static String getSourceFileInPath(File path,
                         String file)
        Parameters:
        path - Path to search for file in. May be null.
        file - Filename to search for. Can't be null.
        Returns:
        Full path to file. null if not found

      • getSourcePath

        public List<File> getSourcePath()
        Returns:
        the source path as a list of File.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        For debugging only.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
